english.segment1: I need direction in my life. Would You show me Your way. Cause I know it is right
english.segment2: I need Your lovin' in my life. You're the only one whose love. Is better than life
english.segment3: Jesus I long to see Your face. Jesus I long. Jesus I long to see Your face. Jesus I long
english.segment4: I need Your favor in my life. Would You show me Your way. Cause I know it is right
english.segment5: I need Your grace in my life. You're the only one whose love. Is better than life
